div.head: 吐泄
div.div: vomiting and outflow to stimulate vomiting and outflow

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: vomiting and outflow to stimulate vomiting and outflow

sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with tu li 吐利① , vomiting and free flow. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry huang qi 黃耆 quoting Ben cao meng quan 本草蒙筌 : 如患內傷，脾胃衰弱，飲食怕進，怠惰嗜眠，發 熱惡寒，嘔吐泄瀉，及夫脹滿痞塞，力乏形羸，脈息虛微，精神短少 , “If one suffers from internal harm, with the spleen and stomach weakened, and an aversion to beverages and food, a feeling of being tired and a desire to sleep, an effusion of heat and an aversion to cold, with vomiting and outflow, abdominal distension with a feeling of fullness, obstacle-illness with blockage, weakness and emaciation, a depletion [movement in the] vessels, and faint breathing, with a diminished spirit”, writes: 凡內傷脾胃，發熱惡寒，吐泄怠臥，脹滿痞塞，神 短脈微 , “When there is internal harm to spleen and stomach, [this will result in] an effusion of heat and an aversion to cold, vomiting and outflow and a desire to lie down, distension with a feeling of fullness, obstacle-illness and blockage. The spirit is deficient, and the [movement] in the vessels is faint”.

② Pathological Condition identical with tu xie 吐瀉② , vomiting and outflow. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hua shi 滑 石 quoting Pu ji fang 普濟方 : 藿香吐液散，治大人小兒，諸嘔逆吐瀉，或霍亂不安 , “The powder with huo xian for vomiting liquid cures adults and children alike with all types of vomiting with counterflow and vomiting with outflow, or cholera with restlessness”, modifies the indications to: 伏暑吐泄，或吐，或泄，或瘧，小 便赤，煩渴 , “ Vomiting and outflow brought forth by latent summerheat, with either vomiting, or outflow, or malaria, red urine, and vexation with thirst”. ③ Pharmacological Effect identical with BCGM 吐瀉 tu xie , to stimulate vomiting and outflow. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zao xiu 蚤休 quoting Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 : 吐瀉瘰癧 writes: 吐泄瘰癧 , “[Apply medication] stimulating vomiting and outflow [to cure] scrofula with pervasion-illness”.
